snippet: TELEN--Abraham, age 98, passed away June 9, 2016. Predeceased by Florence, his wife of more than 60 years, and his sister Sophie. Survived by his daughters Fran Leventhal and Marilyn Telen, his grandchildren Alex, Ilene, Sam and Ben, and his great- grandchildren Elyana, Jackson, Finley, and Sarah. He loved his family above all else and taught us to be generous and welcoming to people from all backgrounds and walks of life. These lessons and his quick sense of humor will remain with us. 1/3
lead_paragraph: TELEN--Abraham, age 98, passed away June 9, 2016. Predeceased by Florence, his wife of more than 60 years, and his sister Sophie. Survived by his daughters Fran Leventhal and Marilyn Telen, his grandchildren Alex, Ilene, Sam and Ben, and his great- grandchildren Elyana, Jackson, Finley, and Sarah. He loved his family above all else and taught us to be generous and welcoming to people from all backgrounds and walks of life. These lessons and his quick sense of humor will remain with us. 1/3
